sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HomeServiceService } from 'src/app/Services/home-service.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { // var info getAddress:any getEmail:any getPhone:any getTodays:any // var to footer getOpenTime:any getDays:any getClose:any constructor(private service:HomeServiceService, private Router:Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getContactFun(); this.getHoursFun(); } getContactFun() { this.getAddress=this.service.getContactSer[3].address; this.getEmail=this.service.getContactSer[1].email; this.getPhone=this.service.getContactSer[0].phone; this.getTodays=this.service.getContactSer[2].todays; } getHoursFun() { this.getDays=this.service.getHours[1].days; this.getClose=this.service.getHours[2].close; this.getOpenTime=this.service.getHours[0].openTime; } homeFun(){this.Router.navigate([''])} ourServicesFun(){this.Router.navigate(['services'])} ourBarbersFun(){this.Router.navigate(['barbers'])} contactFun(){this.Router.navigate(['contact'])} aboutFun(){this.Router.navigate(['about'])} myBook(){this.Router.navigate(['mybook'])} }
